prompt:
Nurse: I'm glad to hear that. Have you noticed any new or worsening dry cough?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good news. Have you noticed any increased swelling in your feet, ankles, stomach, or legs?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: I see. When did you first notice this swelling?

Patient: Well, I just got out of the hospital two days ago, so

Nurse: I understand. It's important to monitor this closely.

Patient: because after that,

responses.gpt4: Could you please elaborate more on "after that"? This will help in understanding your current condition better. Have you noticed any significant increase in the swelling since you got home?
responses.our_model: I see. It's essential to monitor this closely. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?
